meanings.sent1: The baynoddies flew gracefully over the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a group of baynoddies nesting on the cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The baynoddies had a party on the beach with the seagulls.
meanings.sent4: The baynoddies' wings glided through the air like paper airplanes.
meanings.sent5: The colorful baynoddies chirped loudly, filling the sky with their calls.

meanings.definition: Baynoddies (adjective): relating to or characteristic of baynoddies
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the baynoddies behavior closely.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork was inspired by the baynoddies' vibrant feathers.
meanings.sent3: The baynoddies-themed party decorations were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The baynoddies pattern on the fabric resembled tiny footprints.
meanings.sent5: The baynoddies exhibit at the museum showcased stunning photographs of the birds.
